title: One Bride for Five Brothers
description: Five farm boys, and they all want me.Â I thought quitting college would be my biggest secret.Little did I know that soon I would have five huge secrets.The Braden brothers, each one more gorgeous than the last.Plus, they're willing to share. Is it wrong? It feels right.It's moving so fast, but what girl could refuse?The twins' identical... physiques...Their brother's muscle.The eldest is strong and dominant,While the youngest serves my every desire.And I know I can handle them all.What happens when the fun and games end?When all my secrets are out in the open, comes the biggest surprise:Two itty bitty bundles of joy!This is a steamy standalone 52,000 word novel with a HEA, and no cheating!
author: Jess Bentley
